name: Ab Initio
overview:
Ab Inito has created a new class of software for building, powering, and managing mission-critical information processing systems.

Named the co-operating system for the way it bring together disconnected part of a business - different types of data, disparate hardware paltforms, dissonant technologies - Ab Inito Software solves the hardest problems in corporate computing.

The Co-Operating System collects and process massive amounts of data from the widest array of source using any and all hardware resource availabe.

The co-operating System makes it possible to scale applications infinitely as data volumes grow.

The world’s leading companies are using Ab Inito’s Co>Operating System.
